name: International Human Rights Committee
goal: An independent organisation dedicated to defending, promoting and protecting human rights, focusing specifically freedom of religion and belief issues. The IHRC has specific expertise and experience in this area working on minority issues and freedom of religion or belief
interests: Borders and Security, Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Migration and asylum, Youth
euInitiatives:
Working on FORB issues
EU Guidelines on human rights
Advocating freedom of religion or belief
Providing fact finding information and submitting relevant reports
